lead_paragraph: The service will be available by March and will offer a combination of new shows as well as a collection of recently aired programs and other offerings from the broadcasters’ back catalogs.

headline.print_headline: BBC and ITV to Offer Shows to U.S.
headline.main: BBC and ITV to Offer Streaming Service of British Shows in U.S.

snippet: The service will be available by March and will offer a combination of new shows as well as a collection of recently aired programs and other offerings from the broadcasters’ back catalogs....
abstract: British television broadcasters BBC and ITV plan March 2017 launch of BritBox, video-on-demand service that will stream their shows to American audiences via televisions, smartphones and mobile devices.
